MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas affecting properties in Wynter Lane and surrounding area. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required to an underground cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:11am on 14th October 2020.
